author: dlr
msg: SWIG bindings: Improve coverage of the svn_mergeinfo.h APIs.
While this commit focuses on the Python and Ruby bindings, it's not
expected to break anything in the Perl bindings ("3client" still
reports some problems on Fedora Core).
MERGEHASH for both Python and Ruby.
and rename Ruby typemap from MERGEHASH_INOUT.
Python typemap.  (May need a temp local variable...)
typemap, expose it to Python, and and move it higher up in the file.
(%apply apr_hash_t **MERGEINFO): Rename MERGEHASH typemap, expose it
to Python, and move it higher up in the file. Add mapping for
(%ignore svn_mergeinfo_merge): Use inlined varition instead, to
account for variable naming differences to apply the correct
and expose to Python as well as Ruby.
to whoever left this visible, instead of deleting it from HEAD).
slightly broken handling of the CONSIDER_INHERITANCE parameter).
New test suite for SWIG/Python svn_mergeinfo.h-based APIs.
Add mergeinfo.py (along with some extraneous debugging code).

author: dlr
msg: Create branch for Python bindings fixes for svn_mergeinfo.h.

author: cmpilato
msg: Describe merge source normalization, then add/tweak some docstrings and
parameter naming/ordering to refer to this explanation.
(MERGEINFO MERGE SOURCE NORMALIZATION): New comment section.
(start -> revision1, end -> revision2).  Add docstring references
rev2 -> revision2).  Add docstring references to new comment
normalize_merge_sources): Add docstring references to new comment

author: hwright
msg: Remove an inadvertent commit in r27566.
